name: A-V01D
description:
This is our submission for the first ever Eggplant Show Game Jam for the month of February. This month's optional theme was "Going into the Void" - which was the title of an episode featuring Cara Ellison and Farbs discussing their new game: Void Bastards.

Kevin Thompson - Design, Code, reality checker

uaq/ben - Design, Art, Sound, blue sky enthusiast
